segments.text: Please tell me how to file things according to the concerned rules .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , all right . There are four points you should keep in mind when you file documents , information and other things .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: They are keep the documents in chronological order , remove all the chips and pins , punch the documents evenly and place them in the folder .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: And what is the most important point ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You should always remember that one customer one file is the rule .
segments.speaker: S2
